title: High Voltage Cable Supply for Northern Grid Expansion
scope_excerpt:
Supply of 15km of 132kV XLPE Cables. 
Line Item 1: 132kV 1x630mm2 XLPE Cable, Copper Conductor, Lead Sheath. Quantity: 10000 meters. Standards: IEC 60840.
Line Item 2: 33kV 3x300mm2 XLPE Cable, Aluminum Conductor, PVC Oversheath. Quantity: 5000 meters. Tests required: Type Test, Routine Test.
